description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Travel through four levels of constant action in this space shooter, an homage to the 2D shoot-'em-ups from the 80's. Choose one from SIX different pilots, each with its own profile and collect up to EIGHT different weapons, including missiles, defense shields and the ultimate weapon - the pulverizer. Play solo or with a friend: you will have a blast in this sci-fi adventure from the past!
